Text: Other games are integrated with twitch so that chat can influence gameplay, this can provide fun and interesting new gameplay options for you and your viewers to enjoy. Now Age of Empires 4 has this functionality too! Twitch chat can spawn units, give resources, delete buildings, and much more as you battle for victory. \r\n\r\nUse this mod in conjunction with the website: https://aoe4ti.com/ or else nothing will work.
Took stuff from %1PLAYERCOLOUR% and gave it to the next lowest score player

Other games are integrated with twitch so that chat can influence gameplay, this can provide fun and interesting new gameplay options for you and your viewers to enjoy. Now Age of Empires 4 has this functionality too! Twitch chat can spawn units, give resources, delete buildings, and much more as you battle for victory. \r\n\r\nUse this mod in conjunction with the website: https://aoe4ti.com/ or else nothing will work. Remember to select Blue as your colour if you are the one running the powershell script.
Chat chose a dead player so I'll choose someone else
